snippet: Digital hearing aids can do wonders for faded hearing, but other devices can help, too, as audio technology adds new options to help people converse at a noisy restaurant, or talk quietly with a pharmacist at a crowded drugstore counter, writes Anne...
abstract: Digital hearing aids can do wonders for faded hearing, but other devices can help, too, as audio technology adds new options to help people converse at a noisy restaurant, or talk quietly with a pharmacist at a crowded drugstore counter, writes Anne Eisenberg in Sunday's New York Times.

headline.main: Novelties: For Hard of Hearing, Clarity Out of the Din
